topics.body:
"@Carcass Strife":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54f28eea6368727bfeae0400#post_54f28eea6368727bfeae0400
I legitimately don't get why they don't make half-life 3; it would be a good idea business wise and it would flat out take away all press from everyone else.

GDC:
"Announcing a new Call of Duty"
*audience cheering*
"Announcing a new Halo"
*audience cheering slightly more forced*
"Announcing a new FPS franchise"
*audience pretending to cheer*
Gaben walks in
"So I know everyone wants to hear about a new Half-Life game, but here's SteamOS and here's all the new things worth mentioning-"
*at the end of the speech*
"-oh I almost forgot this sticky note; SteamOS will be compatible and launch at the same day as our latest Dota patch. . and Half-Life 3 launch."
*crowd collectively orgasms so hard that the force of the jizz exceeds light speed thus destroying the universe*
